menu.name: VS Nafrox Options
menu.desc: You may change your experience here.

checkbox.name: Disable Notifications
checkbox.desc: If checked, you won't receive a notification on your computer when you enter a song. Welp, there goes the immersivity.

checkbox.name: Disable Shaders
checkbox.desc: If checked, the game will automatically disable these pesky shaders that cause lag on the songs you're playing.

checkbox.name: Warning Screen Skip
checkbox.desc: If checked, the warning screen that appears every time you open the application will stop appearing, skipping to the title screen.

checkbox.name: Hide Framerate
checkbox.desc: If checked, the framerate, memory and other things text on the top left will be hidden from all instances (To make it visible again, uncheck it and RESTART YOUR GAME for it to take effect).

choice.name: Splash Style
choice.desc: There really is no reason for this to exist, but HEY, customization!!
